;===============================================================
;== VANILLA ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ======================
;===============================================================
;; Triggers has been modified to meet Chiv's design/dv
;; Vanilla triggers removed completely/dv

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;CHIVALRY TRIGGERS;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

;; Outcommented triggers mean not defined in anc section 
;;and/or not in export_anc (needs bugfix)
;; ... is fixed /dv
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

; armenian section fixed and changed /dv
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armenian_siege_engineer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
		  and FactionType seleucid
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= marketcenter_colony
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary armenian_siege_engineer chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armenian_siege_engineer2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
		  and CultureType barbarian
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= crusade2
		  and SettlementBuildingExists >= marketcenter_colony
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary armenian_siege_engineer2 chance  2
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armenian_siege_engineer3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
		  and not FactionType seleucid
		  and CultureType greek
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= marketcenter_colony
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary armenian_siege_engineer2 chance  1

; mp added
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armenian_priest
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= achurch1
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary armenian_priest chance  10  

; mp a.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Catholicos_of_Cilicia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Catholicos_of_Cilicia
          and FactionType seleucid
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary Catholicos_of_Cilicia chance  10  

; mp a.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hazarapetutyun
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tax_office
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary Hazarapetutyun chance  5  

; changed/dv	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_crusknight
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= marketcenter_colony

    AcquireAncillary crusknight chance  3

; changed/dv
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_crusnoble
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= marketcenter_colony

    AcquireAncillary crusnoble chance  5

; changed/dv
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_latinmerchant
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= safe_sea 

    AcquireAncillary latinmerchant chance  10

; added /dv
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_latinmerchant2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType barbarian
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= safe_sea

    AcquireAncillary latinmerchant chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Malhaz
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid

    AcquireAncillary Malhaz chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Gahnamak
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary Gahnamak chance  5  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_chronicler
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary chronicler chance  5  

; mp a.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_joannes
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
          and EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
		  and I_TurnNumber >=  96
          and I_TurnNumber <=  226
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists joannes
		  and FactionType parthia
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
	  
	AcquireAncillary joannes chance  12

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_turk
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100         


	AcquireAncillary turk chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_estonian2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Reval = armenia


	AcquireAncillary estonian2 chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_podesta
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and I_SettlementOwner Pisa = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
	
	AcquireAncillary podesta chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_gonfal2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and I_SettlementOwner Pisa = dacia
          and FactionType dacia
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_barracks
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  		  
	AcquireAncillary gonfal2 chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_gonfal
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and I_SettlementOwner Pisa = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_barracks
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		 		  		  
	AcquireAncillary gonfal chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_muslim2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType romans_scipii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Cordoba = romans_scipii


    AcquireAncillary muslim2 chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_muslim
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType spain
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Cordoba = spain


    AcquireAncillary muslim chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_el_cid
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
		  and I_TurnNumber >=  16 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  40
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists el_cid
		  and FactionType romans_scipii
		  and I_SettlementOwner Toledo = romans_scipii		  
		  		  
	AcquireAncillary el_cid chance  12

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_el_cid1
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
		  and I_TurnNumber >=  16 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  40
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists el_cid
		  and FactionType spain
		  and I_SettlementOwner Toledo = spain	
		  		  
	AcquireAncillary el_cid chance  12
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_estonian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType scythia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Reval = scythia

    AcquireAncillary estonian chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_christian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType macedon
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Toledo = macedon


    AcquireAncillary christian chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_vender
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType scythia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Mecklenburg = scythia


    AcquireAncillary vender chance  50

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType romans_scipii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Cordoba = macedon


    AcquireAncillary frank2 chance  8

          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType spain
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Cordoba = macedon

          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Venezia = romans_julii


    AcquireAncillary venezian2 chance  4

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and I_SettlementOwner Venezia = parthia


    AcquireAncillary venezian chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_kwarizman
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries
    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType egypt
          and InEnemyLands

    AcquireAncillary kwarizman chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_knight
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= knight_estates
          and IsGeneral
	  and Trait Royal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary knight chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_mongol1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType egypt
          and InEnemyLands

    AcquireAncillary mongol1 chance  12 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_monk
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church2
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary monk chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_dejma2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary dejma2 chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_dejma
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary dejma chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_derwish
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Derwish chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_hashishin
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque2 
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  16
          and I_TurnNumber <=  150

    AcquireAncillary Hashishin chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_captured_shield
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

    AcquireAncillary captured_shield chance  12 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_orthodox_priest
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ochurch1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary orthodox_priest chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_son_of_a_foreing_noble
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary son_of_a_foreing_noble chance  6

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_captured_banner
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

    AcquireAncillary captured_banner chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_minstrel
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_villa
          and IsGeneral
		  and not Trait Pious > 1

    AcquireAncillary minstrel chance  6

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_jester
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and IsGeneral
		  and not Trait Pious > 1

    AcquireAncillary jester chance  4 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_bishop
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church1

    AcquireAncillary ctw_bishop chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_cardinal
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3 
          and IsFactionLeader

    AcquireAncillary ctw_cardinal chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_inquisitor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType romans_scipii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3 
          and IsGeneral
		and Trait Royal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary ctw_inquisitor chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_inquisitor1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3 
          and IsGeneral
	  and Trait Royal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary ctw_inquisitor chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_imam
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1 
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary ctw_imam chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ctw_shaman
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple1 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary ctw_shaman chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_tizona1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType spain
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists tizona

    AcquireAncillary tizona chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_tizona2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_scipii
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists tizona
          and I_TurnNumber >= 40 
          and I_TurnNumber <= 295 

    AcquireAncillary tizona chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_joyeuse1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists joyeuse

    AcquireAncillary joyeuse chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_joyeuse2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists joyeuse

    AcquireAncillary joyeuse chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_curtana
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType britons
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists curtana

    AcquireAncillary curtana chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_zulfiqar1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType macedon
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists zulfiqar

    AcquireAncillary zulfiqar chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_zulfiqar2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType greek_cities
          and Attribute Command >= 8
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists zulfiqar

    AcquireAncillary zulfiqar chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_szczerbiec
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType numidia
          and Attribute Command >= 2
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists szczerbiec

    AcquireAncillary szczerbiec chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_emperor
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
                  and EndedInSettlement
		  and FactionType germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Koeln = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Milano = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Verona = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Strasburg = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Magdeburg = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Salzburg = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Slesvig = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Wuerzburg = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Wien = germans
                  and I_SettlementOwner Augsburg = germans
        	  and Trait KingOfGermany >= 1
                  and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_emperor
	  
	AcquireAncillary office_emperor chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_KingofScotland
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
                  and EndedInSettlement
		  and FactionType britons
                  and I_SettlementOwner Edinburgh = britons
	          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_KingofScotland

	AcquireAncillary office_KingofScotland chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_KingofScotland1
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
                  and EndedInSettlement
		  and FactionType scythia
                  and I_SettlementOwner Edinburgh = scythia
	          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_KingofScotland

	AcquireAncillary office_KingofScotland chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType britons
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_LordChancellor

    AcquireAncillary office_LordChancellor chance  100

          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Constable

    AcquireAncillary office_Constable chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Poland
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType numidia
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait KingOfPoland >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Krakow = numidia
          and I_SettlementOwner Plock = numidia
          and I_SettlementOwner Wroclaw = numidia
          and I_SettlementOwner Poznan = numidia
          and I_SettlementOwner Brest = numidia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Poland

    AcquireAncillary office_Poland chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Norway
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType scythia
          and I_SettlementOwner Oslo = scythia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Norway

    AcquireAncillary office_Norway chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType britons
          and I_SettlementOwner Oslo = britons

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait CountOfPisa >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Pisa = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Consul

    AcquireAncillary office_Consul chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait KingOfCastile >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Valencia = romans_scipii
          and I_SettlementOwner Toledo = romans_scipii
          and I_SettlementOwner Sevilla = romans_scipii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_ImpSpania

    AcquireAncillary office_ImpSpania chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Hadrianopolis = germans
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Latin

    AcquireAncillary office_Latin chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Hadrianopolis = britons
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = britons

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonika = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Thessal

    AcquireAncillary office_Thessal chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonika = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Thessal

Trigger trigger_office_Jerusalem
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = crusade2
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Jerusalem

    AcquireAncillary office_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = crusade2
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Jerusalem

    AcquireAncillary office_Jerusalem chance  100

          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = crusade2
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Jerusalem

          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = britons

          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = dacia

    AcquireAncillary office_Jerusalem chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Tripoli = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Tripoli

    AcquireAncillary office_Tripoli chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Edessa
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Edessa = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Edessa

    AcquireAncillary office_Edessa chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Edessa1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Edessa = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Edessa

    AcquireAncillary office_Edessa chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Edessa = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Edessa

          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Edessa

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_DomAsia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_DomAsia

    AcquireAncillary office_DomAsia chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_DomEuro

    AcquireAncillary office_DomEuro chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Restorer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType parthia
          and IsFactionLeader
          and I_SettlementOwner Edessa = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Athina = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Dubrovnik = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Al-Iskandariya = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Trapezos = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Murcia = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Tunis = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonika = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Hadrianopolis = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Bari = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Roma = parthia
          and I_SettlementOwner Tarsos = parthia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Restorer

    AcquireAncillary office_Restorer chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_elector
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait DukeOfBoh >= 1
          and FactionType romans_senate
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100          
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_elector

    AcquireAncillary office_elector chance  100

; a. mp
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Croatia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Zadar = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Croatia
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

    AcquireAncillary office_Croatia chance  100

; a. mp
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Croatia1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Zadar = carthage
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Croatia
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

    AcquireAncillary office_Croatia chance  100
	
; a. mp
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Zadar = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Croatia
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

    AcquireAncillary office_Croatia chance  100

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Trigger trigger_kingmaker
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists kingmaker 
          and Attribute Influence >= 5
          and FactionType germans
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary kingmaker chance  10

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists kingmaker
          and Attribute Influence >= 5
          and FactionType gauls
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary kingmaker chance  10

Trigger trigger_witch_hunter
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists witch_hunter 
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3
          and FactionType germans
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary witch_hunter chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists witch_hunter 
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church3
          and FactionType gauls
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary witch_hunter chance  3

          and FactionType dacia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists apothecary
          and FactionType romans_scipii
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary apothecary chance  3

; a. mp.
;------------------------------------------	
Trigger trigger_eunuch	
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType parthia
          and Attribute Influence >= 4
          and Attribute Management >= 4
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists eunuch
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
	
    AcquireAncillary eunuch chance  4

; a. mp
;------------------------------------------	
Trigger trigger_Megas_Primikerios	
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and Attribute Influence >= 3
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Megas_Primikerios
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
	
    AcquireAncillary Megas_Primikerios chance  4
	
; a. mp.
;------------------------------------------	
Trigger trigger_Etairiarches	
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and Attribute Influence >= 3
          and Attribute Command >= 3
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Etairiarches
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
	
    AcquireAncillary Etairiarches chance  100

; damn, bugged conditions/dv
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Hoplitarches
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not Routs
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and FactionType parthia 
         
    AcquireAncillary office_Hoplitarches chance  5

;------------------------------------------

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType parthia

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Rigsjarl
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType scythia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Rigsjarl
         
    AcquireAncillary office_Rigsjarl chance  100

; a. mp.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Pope
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pious > 2
          and I_SettlementOwner Roma = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Pope
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

	AcquireAncillary office_Pope chance 100

; a. mp.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Pope1
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
       	  and Trait Pious > 2
          and I_SettlementOwner Roma = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Pope
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

	AcquireAncillary office_Pope chance 100

; a. mp.
;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pious > 2
          and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Pope
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and EndedInSettlement

	AcquireAncillary office_Pope chance 100

          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral

          and FactionType germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Sachsen
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Sachsen chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Imam_Mecca
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType romans_brutii
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1
          and I_SettlementOwner Tabuk = romans_brutii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Imam_Mecca 
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Imam_Mecca chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Imam_Mecca1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType macedon
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1
          and I_SettlementOwner Tabuk = macedon
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Imam_Mecca 
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Imam_Mecca chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Imam_Mecca2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType pontus
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1
          and I_SettlementOwner Tabuk = pontus
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Imam_Mecca 
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Imam_Mecca chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType thrace
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque1
          and I_SettlementOwner Tabuk = thrace
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Imam_Mecca 
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Imam_Mecca chance  100

          and not IsFactionLeader

          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Imam_Mecca 
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Imam_Mecca chance  100

          and not IsFactionLeader

          and I_SettlementOwner Kutaisi = seleucid
          and FactionType seleucid
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType macedon
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Amir_Muslimeen
          and I_SettlementOwner Fas = macedon
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Amir_Muslimeen2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Amir_Muslimeen
          and I_SettlementOwner Fas = greek_cities
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Amir_Muslimeen chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Malik
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType thrace
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists Malik
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100 
         
    AcquireAncillary Malik chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hafiz
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mosque2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = quoranschool
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Hafiz chance  2      

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Harem
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionType seleucid
          and SettlementBuildingExists = palace_baths
    
    AcquireAncillary Harem chance  5

; mp a.
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Pirate
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
          and not SettlementBuildingExists = safe_sea
          and Trait Disloyal >= 1
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
       
    AcquireAncillary Pirate chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Heretic
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= church2
          and not SettlementBuildingExists = churchprovince2
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Catholic = 1
          and not Trait CrusaderT >= 1
          and Trait Disloyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Heretic chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Mistress1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Girls >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Mistress1 chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Banker
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100    

    AcquireAncillary Banker chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_TrueCrossB
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = parthia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists TrueCrossB
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
          
    AcquireAncillary TrueCrossB chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_TrueCrossB1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists TrueCrossB
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace

    AcquireAncillary TrueCrossB chance  10

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists TrueCrossB
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = parthia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists TrueCross
          
    AcquireAncillary TrueCross chance  10

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists TrueCross
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= crusade2

    AcquireAncillary TrueCross chance  10

Trigger trigger_Troubadour
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern2 

    AcquireAncillary Troubadour chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType dacia
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = sepulchre
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = dacia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
		  and Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Jerusalem1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = sepulchre
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
		  and Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Jerusalem2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = sepulchre
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
		  and Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Jerusalem3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = sepulchre
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
		  and Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Jerusalem4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType britons
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = sepulchre
          and I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem = britons
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Jerusalem
		  and Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Jerusalem chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Novgorod
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists = basilica_novgo
          and I_SettlementOwner Novgorod = armenia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Novgorod
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Novgorod chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Konst1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = basilica_const
          and I_SettlementOwner Konstantinoupoli = parthia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Konst
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Konst chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType dacia
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = dacia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = gauls
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType germans
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = germans
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType britons
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = britons
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = romans_julii
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType seleucid
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = seleucid
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Patriarch_Antioch6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType parthia
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Influence >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stpeter
          and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = parthia
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Patriarch_Antioch
		  and Trait Antcrusader >= 1
		  and not Trait Jerucrusader >= 1
		  and EndedInSettlement
		  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    AcquireAncillary office_Patriarch_Antioch chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_byz_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction parthia
          and FactionType egypt
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists byz_turncoat
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary byz_turncoat chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Magyar_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction carthage
          and FactionType egypt
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Magyar_turncoat
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Magyar_turncoat chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Rus_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction armenia
          and FactionType egypt
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Rus_turncoat
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Rus_turncoat chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Khan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Khan >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Atil = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Perejaslavl = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Iasi = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Olbia = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Ryazan = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Samandar = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Bulgar = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Kutaisi = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Murom = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Itil = egypt
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Khan

    AcquireAncillary office_Khan chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_Tsar
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and I_SettlementOwner Preslav = egypt
          and I_SettlementOwner Craiova = egypt
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists office_Tsar

    AcquireAncillary office_Tsar chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_friend_khan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management >= 2
          and Attribute Influence >= 3
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_friend_khan

    AcquireAncillary office_friend_khan chance  100

;; AI increases bg's exp/number for the royal family members
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_ai_bodyguards
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not FactionIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader

    AcquireAncillary shieldbearer chance  100
	
Trigger trigger_ai_bodyguards2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not FactionIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and IsFactionLeader

    AcquireAncillary swordbearer chance  100
	
Trigger trigger_ai_bodyguards3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not FactionIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and IsFactionHeir

    AcquireAncillary swordbearer chance  100
	
;; generic anc
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_noblefamily
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary familyseal chance  100
	
;; buildings influence
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_swordmaker
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and IsGeneral
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = swordmaker

    AcquireAncillary master_smith chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_dungeon
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and IsGeneral
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = dungeons

    AcquireAncillary torturer2 chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_crusadeoverland
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
		  and IsGeneral
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = crusade1

    AcquireAncillary scout chance  100

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;END;;;;;;;;;;;;;
